articles.title: Elsa Peretti, fashion model and renowned jewelry designer, dies at 80 - The Washington Post
articles.description: Her jewelry designs for Tiffany, incorporating natural shapes, were considered revolutionary.

Her death was announced in a joint statement from her company and the Nando and Elsa Peretti Foundation. The cause was not disclosed.
